de.uos.dgrlvq
Class Painting

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          de.uos.dgrlvq.Painting
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
public class Painting
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class is visualization Engine. With the help of this class the insight of overall assigned DGLVQ classifier can be achived. The object of this class can draw a scatter plot between any two dimentions of pattern and any coordinate space.

Author:
Gulraj Singh Mrok, University Osnabrück, Germany
See Also:
Serialized Form

                int h,
                int gf,
                int x,
                int y)
creates new object

Parameters:
clfr - classifier for which plot has to been drawn.
patternOfEachClass - 3D pattern
vnoppc - valid number of patterns per class
pd - pattern dimention
pl - pattern length
w - width of plot
h - height of plot
gf - grid factor
x - x axis
y - y axis
